footer.about_us_text: We are committed to improving lives through learning. Explore our original research to learn about the forces shaping the modern workplace.

homepage.modal_test_description: Make sure to take the test?
homepage.welcome: Choose the optimal learning path for you
homepage.description: With a carefully designed learning path, this is the perfect choice for you to access new and useful knowledge. The course content is diverse, from basic to advanced, suitable for all learners. Explore and conquer challenges to elevate yourself every day!
homepage.footer1: 77% of learners report career benefits, such as new skills, increased pay, and new job opportunities.
homepage.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
homepage.signin_again_confirm: Please sign in again to continue
homepage.diem: Score achieved in the most recent exam

learning.description: We used many illustrations, and were conscious of explaining in easy-to-understand language and using concrete examples as much as possible.I would be happy if everyone's understanding could be further improved.

teachingPage.description: Become an instructor and change lives of everyone, including your own life

CardsSection.reasonsToStart: There are too many reasons to start
CardsSection.teachYourWayDescription: Publish the desired course, in the desired way, and you always have control over your own content.
CardsSection.inspireStudentsDescription: Teach what you know and help students explore interests, acquire new skills, and advance in their careers.
CardsSection.earnRewardsDescription: Expand your professional network, build expertise, and earn income from each paid enrollment.

GettingStartedTabs.planCurriculumDescription1: Start with your passion and knowledge. Then, choose a promising topic with the help of our Market Insights tool.
GettingStartedTabs.planCurriculumDescription2: You get to decide both what you teach and how you teach it.
GettingStartedTabs.planCurriculumHelp: We offer plenty of resources on how to create your first course. And, our Instructor Dashboard and Curriculum pages help keep you organized.
GettingStartedTabs.recordVideoDescription1: Use basic tools like a smartphone or a DSLR camera. Add a good microphone, and you’re ready to start.
GettingStartedTabs.recordVideoDescription2: If you don’t like to be on camera, just capture your screen. Either way, we recommend recording at least 2 hours of video for a paid course.
GettingStartedTabs.recordVideoHelp: Our support team is available to help you throughout the process and provide feedback on test videos.
GettingStartedTabs.launchCourseDescription1: Gather your first ratings and reviews by promoting your course through social media and your professional networks.
GettingStartedTabs.launchCourseDescription2: Your course will be discoverable in our marketplace where you earn revenue from each paid enrollment.
GettingStartedTabs.launchCourseHelp: Our custom coupon tool lets you offer attractive discounts, and our global promotions help drive traffic to your course.

testimonial1.name: Frank Kane
testimonial1.title: IT and Data Science Certification
testimonial1.quote: I am proud to wake up knowing that my work is helping people around the world improve their careers and create good things. Although becoming a full-time instructor is hard work, this job allows you to work anytime, anywhere, and in the way that you want.

testimonial2.name: Paulo Dichone
testimonial2.title: Developer (Android Specialist)
testimonial2.quote: Udemy has changed my life. Udemy allows me to pursue my passion and become an instructor. I love seeing my students achieve success and hearing them share that they have learned more and faster when taking my courses compared to their time at university. It is an honor and privilege.

testimonial3.name: Deborah Grayson Riege
testimonial3.title: Leadership, Communication
testimonial3.quote: Teaching on Udemy has given me two important things: the opportunity to reach more students than if I did it on my own, and a stable supplemental income. I love sharing my knowledge with others and seeing them advance further in their careers thanks to the knowledge I share.

SupportSection.title: You won't have to do this alone
SupportSection.description: is always available to answer your questions and review your test videos. Additionally, the Teaching Center provides you with plenty of resources to help you throughout the process. Moreover, you will receive support from experienced instructors in the online community.
SupportSection.learnMore: Need more details before you start? Learn more.

JoinTodaySection.title: Become an instructor today
JoinTodaySection.description: Join one of the largest online learning marketplaces in the world.

onboarding.share_knowledge_desc: Courses on VIETCODE provide a learning experience through video. This helps students practice skills easily.
onboarding.create_course_desc: Over the years, we have helped thousands of instructors learn how to record at home. Whether you have experience or not, we will guide you through each step.
onboarding.expand_reach_desc: After publishing the course, you can increase your student base and make an impact with our support. Together, we will help the right audience find your course.
onboarding.teaching_experience: What kind of teaching experience do you have?
onboarding.video_experience: Do you have experience creating videos?
onboarding.followers: How many followers do you have?
onboarding.I have videos ready to upload: I have videos ready to upload

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: To contact us, please use one of the following methods, we will respond as soon as possible.

courseOverview.title: Course Overview
courseOverview.imageDescription: The course image is the first impression that students will have of your course. A high-quality, attractive image will capture attention and increase the chances of enrollment.
courseOverview.courseDescriptionHelper: Your course overview page is very important for your success. Consider creating an engaging course overview that shows why someone should enroll in your course.
courseOverview.errorMinLength: Course name must be at least 12 characters
courseOverview.updateFailure: Failed to update course information. Please try again!
courseOverview.imageUploadFailure: Failed to update course image. Please try again!

targetStudents.title: Target Students
targetStudents.description: The following descriptions will be publicly displayed on your course dashboard and will directly influence a student’s decision on whether the course is suitable for them.
targetStudents.learnWhat: What will students learn in your course?
targetStudents.requirements: What are the requirements or prerequisites to join your course?
targetStudents.updateFailure: Failed to update course information. Please try again!

contentByStatus.0: Your course has not been published yet. Please check and make sure that the content and price of your course are completed before submitting the publication request.
contentByStatus.1: You are requesting to publish the course. The administrator will review this request before approval, and the course will be made public if it meets the standards.
contentByStatus.2: Your course has been successfully published. Learners can now search for and enroll in this course.
contentByStatus.3: Your course has been published but only allows searching and enrollment for a limited period. After the expiration, the course will no longer be available for registration.
contentByStatus.4: Your course has been set to private mode. Only you or those with granted access can view this course.
contentByStatus.5: Your course is requesting the publication of additional new content. The administrator needs to review and approve before the content is published.
contentByStatus.6: Your course is requesting the publication of additional new content. The administrator needs to review and approve before the content is published.
contentByStatus.7: Your course is requesting the publication of additional new content. The administrator needs to review and approve before the content is published.

translation.contentDeleteCourse: We are committed to lifelong access for learners. Therefore, you cannot delete the course once it has been published.

pricingAndPublishing.title: Pricing & Publishing
pricingAndPublishing.coursePriceLabel: Set the price for your course
pricingAndPublishing.coursePriceDescription: Here, you can adjust the price of your course. Ensure that your price is set correctly before publishing. The price cannot be changed after publishing!
pricingAndPublishing.statusDescription: The current status of the course.
pricingAndPublishing.deleteCourseWarning: We are committed to lifelong access for learners. Therefore, you cannot delete the course once it has been published.
pricingAndPublishing.modalErrorDescription: Please check the following information to ensure the course meets the requirements:
pricingAndPublishing.modalErrorPrice: 1. Course price: The price must not be empty. Please ensure you have entered a price for the course.
pricingAndPublishing.modalErrorIntroVideo: 2. Introductory video: The course must have an introductory video, it cannot be empty.
pricingAndPublishing.modalErrorImage: 3. Course image: Please add an image for the course to help learners easily identify the content.
pricingAndPublishing.modalErrorGoals: 4. Goals and requirements: The course’s goals and learner requirements must contain at least one item.
pricingAndPublishing.modalErrorCategory: 5. Lesson categories: The course must have at least one lesson category.
pricingAndPublishing.modalErrorLessons: 6. Lessons in the category: Each lesson category must contain at least one lesson (Lesson), and the lesson content (Video or Pdf) must not be empty.
pricingAndPublishing.modalErrorExam: 7. Exam: If there is an exam, the exam must contain at least one question.
pricingAndPublishing.modalErrorVideoDuration: 8. Course video duration: The total video duration in the course must be at least **30 minutes** to ensure quality and completeness of the content.

curriculum.title: Curriculum
curriculum.errorDeleteCategory: Cannot delete. There are elements linked to this chapter.
curriculum.errorDeleteStudyItem: Cannot delete. There are questions linked to this quiz.
curriculum.errorDeleteQuestion: Error occurred while deleting the question.
curriculum.curriculum.warningText: Are you sure you want to delete?
curriculum.alert.maxAnswers: You can add a maximum of {maxAnswers} answers

error.questionEmpty: The question content cannot be empty.
error.insufficientAnswers: There must be at least 2 valid answers.
error.noCorrectAnswer: At least one correct answer must be selected.
error.maxAnswers: You can add a maximum of {{maxAnswers}} answers.
